name: Wine and Cheese Strata
author: kayhayes26
summary: Fantastic crowd pleasing brunch dish we have made for everything from Christmas morning to Mother's Day brunch with mimosas.
ingredients: ½ loaf dry French bread, broken into pieces
1 (1/4 inch thick) ham slice, coarsely chopped
directions: Arrange bread pieces in the prepared baking dish; drizzle with melted butter
Top with Swiss cheese, Monterey Jack cheese, and ham
Whisk milk, eggs, green onions, sherry, mustard, black pepper, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl until foamy; pour over bread mixture
Cover dish tightly with aluminum foil and refrigerate for 24 hours
Remove dish from refrigerator 30 minutes before baking
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Bake strata in the preheated oven for 1 hour
Remove aluminum foil and top with sour cream and Parmesan cheese
Bake, uncovered, until a knife inserted in the strata comes out clean, about 10 more minutes
